name: Help Me Find...
description:
The story sets at the time when the "Woods" is not corrupted, no "Demon Castle" or whatsoever exist there, and when you can just venture out and doing errands from the villager.  Would you like to follow the journey errands of Seru and Eroteme for killing time,  before going home?

The proper game is uploaded

P.S. I mistakenly uploaded the faulty version which have max Lv actors, without proper ending, and missing treasure chests. I'm trying to fix this in 48Hrs
